text: ...And We Drive is an album by Side Walk Slam, released in 2003 by Tooth & Nail Records. ==Critical reception== Exclaim! called the album "an admirable achievement for such a young group, Side Walk Slam seem poised to take back the crown from pop punk's ailing kings." ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2003 albums Category:Tooth & Nail Records albums Category:Side Walk Slam albums
title: ...And We Drive
